text: Kare no min no naka no koman'na choro-tachi wa itta. `Shuaibu yo, watashi-tachi wa, anata mo anata to issho ni shinko suru mono-tachi mo, kono machi kara tsuiho surudearou. Samonakereba, watashi-tachi no shukyo ni kaerubekidearu.' Kare wa itta. `Tatoe watashi-tachi ga (sore o) imikiratte ite mo na nodesu ka
